name: Masaki Watanabe
body:
Masaki Watanabe (mwata [at] ms.u-tokyo.ac.jp)  
Graduate School of Mathematical Sciences,  
the University of Tokyo  
3-8-1 Komaba Meguro-ku Tokyo 153-8914, Japan  

Papers  
4. Tensor product of Kraskiewicz and Pragacz's modules, preprint, arXiv: 1410.7981  
3. Filtrations of b-modules with successive quotients isomorphic to Kraskiewicz and Pragacz's modules realizing Schubert polynomials as their characters, preprint, arXiv:1406.6203v3  
2. On a relation between certain character values of symmetric groups and its connection with creation operators of symmetric functions, J. of Alg. Comb. 41(2), pp. 257--273, 2015  
1. On a relation between certain character values of symmetric groups and its connection with creation operators of symmetric functions, Combinatorial Representation Theory and Related Topics, RIMS kokyuroku 1870, pp.84--97, 2013
